name: Common Errors & Solutions KB
content:
üîß Common Errors & Solutions Knowledge Base

Updated: March 2024

1. Authentication Errors

-------------------

Error:

```

JWT_MALFORMED: Invalid token format

at JWTStrategy.authenticate (/app/src/auth/jwt.ts:45)

```

Solution:

- Check token expiration

- Verify token format: `jwt.io`

- Clear browser cache/cookies

2. Database Connection

-------------------

Error:

```

SequelizeConnectionError: Connection terminated unexpectedly

at Connection.connectFailed (/app/node_modules/sequelize/lib/dialects/postgres/connection-manager.js:149:24)

```

Solution:

```bash

# Check DB status

docker ps | grep postgres

# Restart if needed

docker-compose restart postgres

# Verify connection

psql -h localhost -U postgres -d myapp

```

3. Redis Cache Issues

------------------

Error:

```

RedisError: Connection timeout

at RedisClient.onError (/app/node_modules/redis/index.js:287)

```

Fix:

```javascript

// Update config

const redisConfig = {

retry_strategy: (options) => {

if (options.total_retry_time > 1000 * 60 * 60) {

return new Error('Retry time exhausted');

}

return Math.min(options.attempt * 100, 3000);

}

};

```

4. Deployment Failures

-------------------

Error:

```

CrashLoopBackOff: Back-off restarting failed container

```

Debug steps:

```bash

# Get pod details

kubectl describe pod

# Check logs

kubectl logs --previous

# Verify config

kubectl get configmap app-config -o yaml

```

5. Frontend Build

---------------

Error:

```

FATAL ERROR: Ineffective mark-compacts near heap limit

```

Solution:

```bash

# Increase memory

export NODE_OPTIONS=\"--max-old-space-size=4096\"

# Clean build

rm -rf node_modules/.cache

npm run build

```
